alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Marion; Morgan; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:11PM EDT until June 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shelby County in central Indiana... Northeastern Morgan County in central Indiana... Northern Johnson County in central Indiana... Southern Marion County in central Indiana... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 411 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenwood, or 11 miles south of Indianapolis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Southport and Homecroft around 420 PM EDT. Greenwood, Franklin, New Whiteland and Whiteland around 425 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Boggstown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 92 and 104. Interstate 74 between mile markers 99 and 103. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
